title: Replace Portfolio projects with 10 professional service projects (with live links)

requirements.text: Replace the Portfolio page project dataset with exactly 10 completed, professional service project entries, generated by the system, and ensure each project includes: title, description, category, tools/technologies, and a non-empty live link URL.

quotes: in this website , i want to my portfolio page all project have completed professional service work. which you can genareted it by your own AI or research by google. just do it.
yes, 10 ,Should each project include title, description, tools/technologies, and a live link.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/data/projects.ts` exports an array of exactly 10 projects.
Each of the 10 projects contains `title`, `description`, `category`, `tools` (non-empty array), and `link` (non-empty string).
All project `category` values match one of the existing filter categories: `legal`, `business`, `marketing`, `design`, `video`, `web`.
Each project `link` is a valid absolute URL (starts with `https://`).

requirements.text: Ensure the Portfolio page UI renders all 10 projects correctly and that each project displays an external link icon that opens the project’s live link in a new tab.

quotes: Should each project include title, description, tools/technologies, and a live link.

acceptanceCriteria: On `/portfolio`, the Projects grid renders 10 project cards when the filter is set to “All Projects”.
Every project card shows a clickable external link icon.
Clicking the external link icon opens the project `link` in a new browser tab and preserves `rel="noopener noreferrer"` behavior.

requirements.text: Keep Portfolio filtering behavior working with the new 10 projects so that selecting a category only shows projects from that category.

quotes: i want to my portfolio page all project have completed professional service work.

acceptanceCriteria: Selecting each category tab (Legal/Business/Marketing/Design/Video/Web) filters the grid to only projects whose `category` matches the selected tab value.
Selecting “All Projects” shows all 10 projects again.

constraints: Do not add any external database or third-party services to generate or store portfolio projects; the projects must remain a static frontend dataset.
Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other frontend immutable paths specified by SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Implementing automated web search/Google research integration for portfolio data.
Adding new pages, routes, or backend storage for portfolio projects.
